resources.string:
ABOUT PROMETHEAN:
Promethean is BVRIT Annual National Level Technical Symposium With The Motive of "Spreading Flames of Knowledge". Promethean Provides A Platform To All Those Innovative And Ingenious Techies To Showcase Their Talents And Broaden Their Horizons. Each Year, Thousands of Students From Along The Country Come To Sojourn This Technical Extravaganza. Promethean 2k17 Returns With A Bang This Year All Set To Re-Write History. With A Mix of Spice For The Grey Cells And For The Heart, Promethean Sets Out To Be A Trail-Blazer In Hosting A Roller-Coaster Ride For Those With An Appetite For Science. For We Believe, "Knowledge is Worth Spreading". 

President:
Dr.Y.Krishna Reddy - Principal

"The Event is already registerd and its STATUS IS ON HOLD, Please attend the event to register a new thread of this event again."
